import React from 'react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; import './styles.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function ReportStudent() { // Sample data for the bar chart const data = [ { category: 'Students', value: 500 }, { category: 'Courses', value: 100 }, { category: 'Attendance', value: 200 }, { category: 'Graded Assignments', value: 50 }, ]; return (
